overview: Young-joo calls his childhood friend Woo-hyun when he drinks. Woohyun always comes to pick up such a youngju. He went looking for a long time and was having a hard time, but he couldn't let go when he saw the lord. In fact, Yeong-ju knows that he has a crush on Woo-hyun since childhood and that he has a girlfriend, but doesn't break her heart. Na-hee, the girlfriend who is annoying to such a young-joo. She decides to make Woo-hyun more firmly her own.
title: His secret sex
